My name is Jennifer Tsang, nice to meet you! 

I hold a Bachelor’s in Biomedical Engineering and am currently pursuing a [Master’s in Data Science at the University of British Columbia](https://masterdatascience.ubc.ca/why-data-science/student-success-stories/jennifer-tsang). 

My interests lie in biostatistics, data-driven healthcare, and bridging the gap between healthcare and data science.
